EnvironmentHubMember.name: EnvironmentHubMember
EnvironmentHubMember.description: Represents a member organization in the Environment Hub.

Description.description: A brief description of this org.

DisplayName.description: The name that the user has specified for this member org.

EnvironmentHubId.description: The Org ID of this member’s Environment Hub org.

Instance.description: Name of the instance where the Environment Hub member org resides.

IsFedIdSsoMatchAllowed.description: Indicates if single sign-on (SSO) has been enabled based on matching the Federation ID. The default is false.

IsSandbox.description: Indicates if the member org is a sandbox (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 36.0 and later.

MemberEntity.description: The unique Org ID of the member org for this record.

MemberType.description: The type of member org for this record. Possible values include Branch Org, Patch Org, Release Org, Sandbox Org, Trialforce Management Org, and Trialforce Source Org. Note Only one member type at a time is stored. Member type is determined according to this hierarchy: (1) Sandbox, (2) Release, (3) Trialforce Source Org (TSO), (4) Patch, (5) Branch, and (6) Trialforce Management Org (TMO). For example, if an org is both a sandbox and a TMO, the value of MemberType is Sandbox Org.

Name.description: The name of the member org for this record.

OrgEdition.description: The org’s edition, for example, Enterprise Edition or Unlimited Edition.

OrgStatus.description: The licensing or creation status of this org. Possible values include Active, Demo, Deleted, Free, Inactive, and Trial.

Origin.description: The method by which this org was added to the Environment Hub. Possible values are autoDiscovered, userAdded, and provisioned.

SSOMappedUsers.description: The total number of mapped users in this member org. This field is available in API version 36.0 and later.

ServiceProviderId.description: The ID of the service provider for this member org. This field is available in API version 36.0 and later.

ShouldAddRelatedOrgs.description: Status of the connection of related orgs to the hub. Possible values are done, notRequested, pending, and requested.

ShouldEnableSSO.description: If SSO should be enabled when this member org is added. The default is false.

SsoStatus.description: If SSO has been enabled for this org. Possible values are: Enabled—Single sign-on is enabled. Disabled—Single sign-on is disabled. Pending—Single sign-on is in the process of being enabled. Failed—Single sign-on enablement failed. Contact Salesforce support for assistance.

SsoUsernameFormula.description: The custom formula for matching users in the hub and member orgs.
